meanings.definition: A board that is superior in quality or performance.
meanings.sent1: The superboard was the best one in the store.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter used the superboard for the new shelves.
meanings.sent3: The superboard decided to challenge the other boards to a quality contest.
meanings.sent4: Her skills were a superboard, standing out among the rest.
meanings.sent5: The superboard gleamed with excellence, catching everyone's eye.

meanings.definition: A board that is used for construction or other purposes and is exceptionally strong or durable.
meanings.sent1: The superboard held up the entire structure with ease.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to use the superboard for the foundation of the house.
meanings.sent3: The superboard boasted about its strength to the other boards.
meanings.sent4: His determination was a superboard, unbreakable and resilient.
meanings.sent5: The superboard stood firm against the test of time, never faltering.
